text: Alassane Ouattara (born 1 January 1942) is an Ivoirian politician. He became President of Côte d'Ivoire in 2011. He is an economist, Ouattara worked for the International Monetary Fund (IMF)."Ivory Coast's Alassane Ouattara in profile" , BBC News Online, 11 April 2011. He was the Prime Minister of Côte d'Ivoire from November 1990 to December 1993. ==References== ==Other websites== Alassane Ouattara.com Political Web site from Ouattara's circle of influence. title: Alassane Ouattara
